text: Vastavika ti kevala nave aheta, ji tumhi ani tumacya vadavadilanni tyanna thevali aheta. Allahane tyanci konatihi sanada avatarita keli nahi. He loka tara kevala atakala (bhrama) ani apalya manacya iccha akanksammage lagale aheta. Ani nihsansaya, tyancya palanakartyatarphe tyancyajavala margadarsana ye'una pohocale ahe
